catalog_info.title: Animal Husbandry Statistics - Uttar Pradesh
catalog_info.description: This dataset provides livestock population data at the district level for Uttar Pradesh. It is valuable for AI modeling related to agricultural planning, resource allocation, and predicting livestock trends, supporting informed decision-making in the animal husbandry sector.

provenance.ministry: Ministry of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying
provenance.jurisdiction: Uttar Pradesh (specifically districts: Bareilly, Kanpur, Varanasi, Allahabad, Lucknow)

spatial_temporal.spatial_coverage: Districts of Uttar Pradesh: Bareilly, Kanpur, Varanasi, Allahabad, Lucknow
